TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpSessionStateWrapper extends System.Web.HttpSessionStateBase

summary.span: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that provides access to session-state values, session-level settings, and lifetime management methods.

span.span: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that provides access to session-state values, session-level settings, and lifetime management methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类，并充当包装类。The class derives from the class and serves as a wrapper for the class. 此类公开的功能类并公开类型。This class exposes the functionality of the class and exposes the type. 类让您替换的原始实现使用自定义实现，如执行单元测试在 ASP.NET 管道外部应用程序中的类。The class lets you replace the original implementation of the class in your application with a custom implementation, such as when you perform unit testing outside the ASP.NET pipeline.
